title: Mini Projector, Compatible with 4K 1080 P Portable Projector with Dual Band WIFI6 5G Wireless 5.0 Bluetooth,160 ANSI Lumens, 180° Rotation, Auto Keystone Correction, Projectors Without HDMI Cable
description: Mini Projector, Compatible with 4K 1080 P Portable Projector with Dual Band WIFI6 5G Wireless 5.0 Bluetooth,160 ANSI Lumens, 180° Rotation, Auto Keystone Correction, Projectors Without HDMI Cable
about: 【Smart Projector with Android TV 11.0】Experience a world of entertainment with over 4000 apps at your fingertips, including access to popular streaming platforms like Netflix, Prime Video, YouTube and more. Enjoy an extensive library of over 500,000 movies and TV shows. This mini projector equipped with Android 11.0 operating system, Mali-G31 GPU and WiFi 6 technology, our mini projector ensures perfect connectivity and top-notch performance for a truly smart viewing experience.

【1080P HD Video Projection】Native 1080P resolution with 4K support delivers crisp and clear images. Uses advanced LED technology for bright and vivid projections. Connect seamlessly with the latest WiFi 6 and Bluetooth 5.2 ensures smooth transmission, also compatible with 2.4G and 5G networks, features Bluetooth 5.2 function and connectivity to your favorite devices. This projector delivers stunning images with brightness of 160 ANSI lumens and a 1500:1 contrast ratio, ensuring vivid colors and crisp details.

【180° Rotatable Projection】No need for complex installations, this mini projector allows perfect rotation for wall, ceiling or even floor projections. Immerse yourself in a wide 35-130 inch screen for a truly immersive viewing experience. This projector is perfect for home theater, entertainment, early childhood education, video conferencing and online teaching, providing versatility for various needs.

【Auto Keystone Correction & 360° Sound】Instantly correct and focus with the auto key and manual focus adjustment for a perfect picture in seconds. Enjoy room-filling 360-degree audio for an enhanced cinematic experience with this compact yet powerful smart projector.

【Low Noise & Multi-Device Connectivity】With a high-performance cooling system that produces noise levels below 25dB, enjoy a quiet viewing environment while experiencing stunning visual effects. Equipped with HDMI, USB, and audio ports for seamless compatibility with laptops, TV cards, USB drives and more.

about: ✅ Boult X Mustang: World Class Design | Advanced Tech | Exhilarating Speed. ✅ 45ms Low Latency Gaming: Enjoy minimal delay and maximum precision with 40ms low latency, ensuring you're always in perfect sync with on-screen video and gaming. Elevate your gameplay with fluid audio and seamless connectivity.

✅ BT 5.4: Stay connected seamlessly with Bluetooth 5.4 standard that offers enhanced stability, faster transmission speeds, and extended range. Enjoy reliable connectivity and high-quality audio streaming whether you're at home, in the gym, or on the go.

title: Boult Audio Maverick with 35H Playtime, 45ms Xtreme Low Latency Mode, Quad Mic ENC, Type C Fast Charging (10Mins=120Mins), 10mm Drivers, BT 5.3, IPX5 Airbass True Wireless in Ear Earbuds (Black)

about: ✅35H Playtime: Enjoy an astounding 35 hours of playtime on a single charge with our cutting-edge wireless earphones. Whether you're on a long-haul flight, a road trip, or a marathon gaming session, our earbuds will keep you immersed in your favorite content without the worry of constant recharging.

Experience lightning-fast response times as low as 45ms with *interactive LEDs*, allowing you to hear every crucial in-game sound in real-time, ensuring you're ahead of the competition and never miss a beat.

✅Touch Controls: Take full control of your audio experience with intuitive touch controls. Play or pause your music, skip tracks, answer calls, or activate your voice assistant—all with a simple tap or swipe on the earbuds' touch-sensitive surface.

title: Mivi SuperPods Immersio [Flagship Launch] in Ear Ear Buds Wireless, Dolby Audio, 3D Soundstage, 60H Playtime, AI ENC, Bluetooth TWS, BT v5.4 Earbuds
description: Mivi SuperPods Immersio has been crafted to bring the Dolby Audio experience to your TWS earbuds. With Immersio it feels like "Cinema in your ears". Crafted with love for OTT lovers, step into a whole new level of binge-watching with Dolby's signature sound where action is brought to life by elevating sound for a cinematic viewing experience. The audio expectation with powerfully engineered flagship TWS is to offer a perfect balance of Power and Clarity in your ears. These Bluetooth headsets have Quad-mic AI ENC for environmental noise reduction. They also have 3D Soundstage, a revolutionary audio tech which offers you a new sound dimension where you can hear each instrument in a song clearly. The SuperPods Immersio has 60 Hours of combined playtime and offers 8.5 hours of on-buds playtime and Type-C swift charging. The earbuds also offer you 13mm high-fidelity drivers to provide you with the best listening experience across genres. These powerful industry-leading tech makes these wireless Bluetooth earphones unapologetically, one of the best earbuds in the market. SuperPods Immersio comes in four vibrant shades for you to choose from based on your preference. They also come with IPX 4.0 sweat resistance, ready to be worn anytime no matter how intense or hustling your routine is. SuperPods Immersio is made by us with love for you at the Mivi Design Studio in India.

title: Ambrane Magsafe Wireless 10000Mah Fast Charging USB Type-C Input Power Bank, Strong Magnet, 22.5W Output For iPhone 12 & Above, Android & Other Qi Enabled Devices + Magnetic Ring (Aerosync Snap, Blue)
description: Ambrane Magsafe Wireless 10000Mah Fast Charging USB Type-C Input Power Bank, Strong Magnet, 22.5W Output For iPhone 12 & Above, Android & Other Qi Enabled Devices + Magnetic Ring (Aerosync Snap, Blue)
about: High-Capacity Battery: The Aerosync Snap boasts a 10000 mAh capacity, providing ample power to keep your devices charged throughout the day. It supports quick recharging up to 3.5 hours using 20W PD chargers.
Multiple Charging Ports: Equipped with a 22W Type-C, 22.5W USB-A, and 15W MagSafe output, this power bank delivers fast and efficient charging for a variety of devices, ensuring you stay connected.
Advanced Charging Protocols: Supports PD 3.0, QC 3.0, VOOC, and PPS protocols for versatile compatibility with a wide range of smartphones and other devices.
Premium Build Quality: Featuring a rubberized coating and a sleek design, the Aerosync Snap is both durable and stylish, making it a perfect accessory for any tech enthusiast.
Multi-Device Compatibility: Compatible with iPhone 12 and above for MagSafe, and all iPhone 8 and above models and Android phones through wired and wireless connections.
Enhanced Safety Features: Multiple layers of protection and auto-connect feature ensure safe and reliable charging, protecting your devices from overcharging, short circuits, and more.

title: boAt Newly Launched PB435 Turbo 35W Power Bank with 20000mAh Battery, 35W 2-Way Super Fast Charging | 12-Layer Smart IC Protection | Triple Output & Dual Input in Sleek Aluminium Casing(Stone Grey)
description: boAt Newly Launched PB435 Turbo 35W Power Bank with 20000mAh Battery, 35W 2-Way Super Fast Charging | 12-Layer Smart IC Protection | Triple Output & Dual Input in Sleek Aluminium Casing(Stone Grey)
about: 20000mAh Capacity: Designed for extended use, the PB435 Turbo features a 20000mAh battery—delivering significantly more power than standard 10000mAh units. Ideal for travel, work, or emergency use, it provides multiple charges for smartphones and tablets

35W 2-Way Fast Charging Technology: Equipped with Quick Charge 3.0, Power Delivery, and Programmable Power Supply (PPS), the PB435 Turbo enables rapid and efficient charging for a wide range of devices.

Triple Output & Dual Input Configuration: With 2 USB-A outputs, 1 Micro-USB input and a 2-way Type-C (output/input), the PB435 Turbo supports simultaneous charging of up to three devices. Whether you're using a smartphone, tablet, or wearable, you can power them all—without compromise.

12-Layer Smart IC Protection: The integrated multi-layer protection system intelligently manages voltage and current flow to safeguard against overcharging, overheating, and short circuits. Charging is optimised and consistent—enhancing both safety and performance.

Highly Durable Aluminium Construction: Crafted with a high-grade aluminium enclosure, the PB435 Turbo offers durability and a refined finish. Resistant to everyday wear and designed for longevity, it maintains its premium look even with rough use.

specs.Connector Type: USB Type C, Micro USB, USB Type A

title: Ambrane 10000mAh Slim & Compact Powerbank, 22.5W Fast Charging, USB & Type C Output, Power Delivery, Quick Charge for iPhone, Android & Other Devices, Made in India + Type C Cable (Stylo 10, Black)
description: Ambrane 10000mAh Slim & Compact Powerbank, 22.5W Fast Charging, USB & Type C Output, Power Delivery, Quick Charge for iPhone, Android & Other Devices, Made in India + Type C Cable (Stylo 10, Black)
about: High-capacity Battery - With a lithium polymer battery of 10000mAh capacity, this powerbank can charge your devices multiple times.

Fast Charging Output - Equipped with 22.5W PD and QC output, this powerbank ensures fast charging so you can stay ahead of the game. On average, it can charge your mobile up to 50% in just 30 minutes.
Fast Charging Input - This powerbank supports 20W fast charging input via a Type-C port, which enables it to charge in just 4 to 5 hours.
Charge Two Devices Simultaneously - With one USB port and one Type-C port for output, this powerbank can charge two devices at the same time.
Versatile Compatibility - Compatible with all devices that can be charged via USB or Type-C port. (Fast charging output is subject to the cable and charging capabilities of the device being charged.)
Stylish & Portable - The sleek and stylish design of this powerbank makes it a statement piece. Its compact size makes it extremely travel-friendly too.
VOOC & Super VOOC Support: This powerbank supports VOOC and Super VOOC charging.
